data.meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.
data.sentence: The word النَّارُ comes from the root ن و ر and is associated with the meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.

data.meanings: to clothe, put on the garment, be confused. sirbil - shirt, clothing/garment, breast plate, coat of mail.
data.sentence: The word سَرَابِيلُهُمْ comes from the root س ر ب ل and is associated with the meanings: to clothe, put on the garment, be confused. sirbil - shirt, clothing/garment, breast plate, coat of mail.

data.meanings: to drop, drip (liquid). taqattara - to fall on the side. taqatara - to walk side by side. aqtar (pl. of qutrun) - sides, regions. qitran - molten copper, liquid pitch.
data.sentence: The word قَطِرَانٍ comes from the root ق ط ر and is associated with the meanings: to drop, drip (liquid). taqattara - to fall on the side. taqatara - to walk side by side. aqtar (pl. of qutrun) - sides, regions. qitran - molten copper, liquid pitch.

data.meanings: to face/encounter/confront, face, will, course/purpose/object one is pursuing, place/direction one is going/looking, way of a thing, consideration/regard.
data.sentence: The word وُجُوهَهُمُ comes from the root و ج ه and is associated with the meanings: to face/encounter/confront, face, will, course/purpose/object one is pursuing, place/direction one is going/looking, way of a thing, consideration/regard.
